scripts.everything: npm run-script check && npm run-script build
scripts.mongo-pids: ps ax | egrep -v 'sh -c|grep' | grep 'mongod --port=27027' | egrep -o '^[0-9]+' || echo None.
scripts.todo: grep -Rn 'TODO' README.md notes-rest/server.js notes/test/js/spec notes/app/js/app notes-rest/app/js/app-rest chapters/*/test/js/spec doc
scripts.check: npm run-script style && npm run-script test
scripts.style: npm run-script style-client && npm run-script style-server
scripts.style-client: ./node_modules/.bin/jshint --config=./dev/jshint-client.json notes/app/js/fixtures notes/test/js/spec notes/app/js/app notes-rest/test/js/spec-rest  notes-rest/app/js/app-rest chapters/*/test/js/spec doc
scripts.test: npm run-script test-app && npm run-script test-rest && npm run-script test-chaps-all && npm run-script test-chaps
scripts.test-chaps: ls chapters/*/test/test*.html | egrep -v "failure|timing" |  xargs -I{} bash -c 'printf "== \e[1;35m{}\e[0m =="; node_modules/.bin/mocha-phantomjs {}'
scripts.min-app: uglifyjs $(cat notes/app/index.html | egrep -o 'js/app/.*?\.js' | xargs -I {} echo 'notes-rest/app/{}') -m -c -o notes/app/js/app.min.js
scripts.min-rest: uglifyjs $(cat notes-rest/app/index.html | egrep -o '(js|js-rest)/app/.*?\.js' | xargs -I {} echo 'notes-rest/app/{}') -m -c -o notes-rest/app/js/app.min.js
scripts.build: npm run-script build-tmpl && npm run-script docs
scripts.build-chap: CHAP=03 && zip -X -x "*.DS_Store" -r ${HOME}/Desktop/5248_${CHAP}_Examples.zip chapters/${CHAP} dev notes notes-rest vendor vendor-ln LICENSE.txt README.md
scripts.build-book: NAME=WIP && zip -X -x "*.DS_Store" -r ${HOME}/Desktop/5248_${NAME}_Examples.zip chapters dev notes notes-rest vendor vendor-ln LICENSE.txt README.md package.json
